NAME: Manish Sharma
ABOUT:
Relentless Optimist....Running and Cricket enthusiast.

A Chartered Accountant and MBA (Finance) by qualification, Manish brings on the Board over 20 years of diverse experience across the industries (Automotive, Retail E-Commerce, FMCG, Education, Consumer Goods, Engineering, Technology and Manufacturing) and across the regions (South Asia, Middle East and Africa).

Manish has wealth of experience in Finance functions management, Cross functional operations management, Business Strategy, Business Plans, Mergers and Acquisitions, Taxation, Investments, Investor Relations and Corporate Restructuring in leadership positions while at JM Morgan Stanley, Ernst & Young, Al Futtaim Group, Juma Al Majid Group and GEMS Education in Dubai. Currently with Tupperware Brands, Manish is leading finance, legal and compliance function for the company in India.
